migration.title: From $2,400 to $650: TechCorp's 3-Week Zapier Migration Success Story
migration.opening: When TechCorp's automation bill hit $2,400 per month last quarter, Sarah Chen, their Head of Operations, knew something had to change. 'We were paying more for automation than for our entire sales tech stack,' she recalls. 'And the worst part? We were still manually fixing workflows every day.'

sections.heading: The Breaking Point
sections.content: TechCorp's journey to Gumloop started with a single failed workflow that cost them $50,000 in lost sales. Their Zapier automations, built over three years, had become a tangled web of workarounds and patches...

sections.heading: Week 1: Assessment and Planning
sections.content: Sarah's team began by mapping every workflow, documenting dependencies, and identifying critical paths. The discovery was shocking: only 47% of their automations were actually necessary...

sections.heading: Week 2: Core Migration
sections.content: With Gumloop's migration tools, the team moved their critical workflows in just 5 days. The AI-powered mapping reduced manual work by 80%...

sections.heading: Results That Speak
sections.content: Three weeks after starting the migration, TechCorp's results exceeded all expectations: 73% cost reduction, 35% faster workflow execution, zero downtime during transition...
